name: More Tacos! - New
description:
Finally, the much requested More Tacos! app has made it to the app store!!! Get it while it's hot!

✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱
Featured on New and Noteworthy in both the Kids and Family categories!
✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱

More Tacos! is better than going to a Taco shop. More Tacos! has a bigger selection than any restaurant.

Create a taco from scratch with this amazing Taco creator. But that's only half the fun! After making a delicious taco to your own liking, take bite after bite until it has disappeared from your plate!

But before you eat your savory taco, save it to your photos, email it to a friend, or upload it to Facebook within the app so you can enjoy it forever.

You can make spicy carnita tacos in a fiery red crunchy shell, Grandma's favorite healthy garden wraps, or even authentic Mexican street tacos.

More Tacos! provides features not available in other similar food apps, such as unlimited undos. Now you can build your taco without worrying about messing up! Also, now you can control the level of hunger which changes how big of a bite you take!

Here's a list of just SOME of the goodies in version 1.0 of More Tacos!

✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱ GOODIES ✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱✱

✓ Tons of shells to pick from: crunchy shells, traditional white corn tortillas, special garden wrap, wheat tortilla, spicy hot shell and MORE!

✓ Select from different types of meat to put in your taco: Carnitas, Shredded Chicken, Grilled Fish, Grilled Shrimp, Shredded Beef, Grilled Chicken, Ground Beef and MORE!

✓ Choose tons of veggies to add to your taco, such as: Luscious Lettuce, Ripe Red Tomatoes, White Onion, Grilled Corn, Hot Peppers from Mexico, Fresh Cilantro, Green Onion, and MORE!

✓ Throw on one of the many extras, including: Refried Beans, Baked Beans, Healthy Black Beans, Mexican Rice, White Rice, Cheddar Cheese, Feta Cheese, and MORE!

✓ Finish it off with a variety of sauces like: Guacamole, Sour Cream, Mild Salsa, Green Salsa, Mango Salsa, Hot Sauce, Chipotle Sauce, and MORE!

✗ Have a suggestion for our app? We listen and are committed to providing frequent updates with many more goodies. As always, updates are free :)
